featuredTrack.title: No Rhyme or Reason
featuredTrack.description: Pure chaos energy. When the pattern breaks and something better emerges.

dailyQuote.text: The foundation holds everything. Be someone's foundation.
dailyQuote.author: Finnian Frost

news.title: Featured Track: No Rhyme or Reason
news.content: Exploring the sonic landscape of 'No Rhyme or Reason' today. Chaotic, Liberating, Wild energy throughout.

news.title: Featured Track: Pretty Damaged
news.content: Track 06: 'Pretty Damaged' - Scars are just stories written on skin. Damage can be beautiful.

news.title: Featured Track: After the Wreckage (we dance)
news.content: Track 11: 'After the Wreckage (we dance)' - The title track spirit. Finding joy in the aftermath. Movement through destruction.

news.title: Featured Track: Static Goddess
news.content: Exploring the sonic landscape of 'Static Goddess' today. Ethereal, Glitchy, Worship energy throughout.

news.title: Featured Track: Glitch Choir
news.content: Track 08: 'Glitch Choir' - Voices from broken circuits singing in perfect disharmony.

news.title: Featured Track: Silver Wreckage
news.content: Diving deep into 'Silver Wreckage' today. This track embodies metallic, aggressive, beautiful.

news.title: Featured Track: Analog Vertigo (The Lullaby)
news.content: 'Analog Vertigo (The Lullaby)' is taking center stage. Spinning backwards while moving forward. A dizzy embrace of warmth and distortion.

news.title: Featured Track: Pretty Damaged
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'Pretty Damaged' - track 06 from our album. Scars are just stories written on skin. Damage can be beautiful.
